name: Geomancer

skills.name: Tremor Staff
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.notes: Useful for reducing enemy debuff application, especially in boss fights.

skills.name: Creeping Petrify
skills.description: Removes all buffs from a target enemy, then attacks them. Steals all buffs if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this champion. Reduces the cooldown of Quicksand Grasp by 2 turns if the target is killed by this skill while under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion.
skills.notes: Synergizes with his own HP Burn. Great for Hydra, Clan Boss, and bosses with buffs.

skills.name: Quicksand Grasp
skills.description: Fully depletes the target’s Turn Meter. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by the amount the target loses. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] and a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 3 turns.
skills.notes: Key skill for boss control and enabling his passive.

skills.name: Stoneguard
skills.description: Decreases the damage all allies receive by 15% and deflects that damage onto each enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion. Whenever this Champion is attacked, deflects 30% of the damage instead. When deflecting damage, on each hit, has a 30% chance of dealing additional damage equal to 3% of the target’s MAX HP.
skills.notes: Unique mechanic, does not trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer. Core to his boss damage.

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 25%.
forms.comments: One of the best Epic champions for Clan Boss, Hydra, Iron Twins, and many bosses. Passive is unique and meta-defining.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Will sometimes use A3 on non-priority targets (e.g., spiderlings), and A2 on low-HP targets, which can be suboptimal in auto-play.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Enables cheese strategies in Clan Boss, Hydra, and Iron Twins by reflecting massive damage via HP Burn.

mechanics_advisory: Stoneguard passive is unique: reflected damage is not a hit, does not trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer, and ignores some artifact set effects. Build for survivability and accuracy.

update_notes.last_patch: Patch 8.00 (2023-12-12): No major changes to Geomancer.
